item.title: Farm Girl Driving a Semi Truck
item.description: Watch a farm girl take the wheel of a semi truck through cornfields, showcasing skill, confidence, and life on the farm.

media:content.media:title: Farm Girl Driving a Semi Truck
media:content.media:description: Watch a farm girl take the wheel of a semi truck through cornfields, showcasing skill, confidence, and life on the farm.

item.title: Why Does No One Want This Massive Loader?
item.description: Check out this massive loader sitting idle—will it start? Watch as we test it, explore its condition, and reveal why it’s been overlooked.

media:content.media:title: Why Does No One Want This Massive Loader?
media:content.media:description: Check out this massive loader sitting idle—will it start? Watch as we test it, explore its condition, and reveal why it’s been overlooked.

item.title: One Day I’ll Be Behind the Wheel of This!
item.description: Dreaming of driving big machines? Watch as we explore powerful vehicles and imagine what it’s like to take the wheel of these impressive machines.

media:content.media:title: One Day I’ll Be Behind the Wheel of This!
media:content.media:description: Dreaming of driving big machines? Watch as we explore powerful vehicles and imagine what it’s like to take the wheel of these impressive machines.

item.title: Rate Our Painting Skills!
item.description: See how we tackled a painting project on the farm and rate our skills, creativity, and attention to detail in bringing the space to life.

media:content.media:title: Rate Our Painting Skills!
media:content.media:description: See how we tackled a painting project on the farm and rate our skills, creativity, and attention to detail in bringing the space to life.

item.title: Broke Down and Stranded
item.description: Experience the challenges of being broke down and stranded, highlighting problem-solving, quick thinking, and the effort to get back on the road.

media:content.media:title: Broke Down and Stranded
media:content.media:description: Experience the challenges of being broke down and stranded, highlighting problem-solving, quick thinking, and the effort to get back on the road.

item.title: Real-Life Farming Simulator
item.description: Experience the day-to-day of farming in a real-life simulator, showcasing equipment, tasks, and the challenges of managing a working farm.

item.title: Connecting the Tractor
item.description: Watch the process of connecting the tractor to implements, highlighting proper technique, safety tips, and efficiency in everyday farm work.

item.title: Pivot Irrigator vs. Drip Irrigation
item.description: Compare pivot irrigation and drip irrigation systems, exploring efficiency, water usage, and benefits for different crops and farming operations.

media:content.media:description: Compare pivot irrigation and drip irrigation systems, exploring efficiency, water usage, and benefits for different crops and farming operations.

item.title: Tractor Towing a 165ft Trailer
item.description: Watch a tractor take on the challenge of towing a massive 165ft trailer, highlighting skill, precision, and the power required for extreme farm hauling.
